Rowdy Wolf:




Rowdy Wolf ducked his head, looking at the dark waters. He knew he couldn't 
swim. In his home in cold climates he never found the need to swim in the 
small lakes. He whimpered seeing Stingtra. He didn't know what to make of 
the snake-like arm that had her and threw her.

He stepped forward, putting his paw into the water, but found that it was 
only about one inch deep.
